name: MediaQueryType
summary: A specifier for a media library query. By default, filters perform an exact match.

properties.name: albumArtist
properties.summary: The album artist to filter on. Value should be a String.

properties.name: albumArtistPersistentID
properties.summary: The album artist persistent ID to filter on. Value should be a Number.

properties.name: albumPersistentID
properties.summary: The album persistent ID to filter on. Value should be a Number.

properties.name: albumTitle
properties.summary: The album title to filter on. Value should be a String.

properties.name: artist
properties.summary: The artist to filter on. Value should be a String.

properties.name: composer
properties.summary: The composer to filter on. Value should be a String.

properties.name: composerPersistentID
properties.summary: The composer persistent ID to filter on. Value should be a Number.

properties.name: genre
properties.summary: The genre to filter on. Value should be a String.

properties.name: genrePersistentID
properties.summary: The genre persistent ID to filter on. Value should be a Number.

properties.name: grouping
properties.summary: A constant that specifies the ordering of the result array.

properties.name: hasProtectedAsset
properties.summary: Filter by whether or not the item is a protected asset. Value should be a Boolean.

properties.name: isCloudItem
properties.summary: Filter by whether or not the item is a cloud item. Value should be a Boolean.

properties.name: isCompilation
properties.summary: Filter by whether or not the item is a compilation. The value should be a Boolean.

properties.name: persistentID
properties.summary: The persistent ID to filter on. Value should be a Number.

properties.name: playCount
properties.summary: The play count to filter on. Value should be a Number.

properties.name: podcastPersistentID
properties.summary: The podcast persistent ID to filter on. Value should be a Number.

properties.name: podcastTitle
properties.summary: The podcast title to filter on. Value should be a String.

properties.name: title
properties.summary: The title to filter on. Value should be a String.
